title: I can't pray Asr in congregation due to class but will pray it later in the masjid  Is that ok?
transcript: from India so sh due to my high school I will miss my ass Salah with jamat at Mid but later I can pray it in mid so can I do this yes alhamdulillah as long as you pray on time and you also try to pray it in the Masjid Maybe with some late comers or even alone as long as it is within the time of ass and skipping it was not because you're lazy rather because of school then inshallah this is legitimate and acceptable
